A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a mess. I have loved Star Wars since I was a little kid and even when I didn't love the movies\, I at least enjoyed them and could appreciate them. This movie was riddled with plot holes and inconsistencies and gave the general impression that whoever wrote it had never seen a Star Wars movie before. They spent too much time trying to create plot twists to keep the audience on their toes and not enough time just crafting a good story. I could rant about how bad this thing was for pages but I won't.
